Title: Le Grand Guignol
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Declan De Barra, Diane Ademu-John, Michelle Paradise (executive story editor), Charlie Charbonneau (story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by), Marguerite MacIntyre (staff writer)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Claire Holt, Phoebe Tonkin
Plot: In a series of flashbacks to 1919, Klaus opens up to Cami and reveals details of the devastating secret Rebekah and Marcel were trying to keep from him. Elijah forms an unlikely alliance ...
